thread.section_title: I'm A Celeb 2017 Australia Cast News and Jungle Updates | Daily Mail Online
thread.title: Ash Pollard insults Kate Fischer over wearing a bra
thread.title_full: Ash Pollard insults Kate Fischer over wearing a bra | Daily Mail Online

author: Monique Friedlander For Daily Mail Australia
title: Ash Pollard insults Kate Fischer over wearing a bra
text:
She's been causing a stir on the I'm A Celebrity... Get Me Out Of Here! camp by roaming the jungle camp wearing singlet tops without a bra.
And Tziporah Malkah, 43, found herself on the receiving end of criticism about her underwear-free ways on Tuesday, following an argument with Ash Pollard.
During the episode, camp cook Ash was tasked with whipping up a kosher meal for Tziporah, prompting the latter to complain that Ash would give her 'cold greasy meat' rather than something palatable.
Scroll down for video
Battle of the bras! Tziporah Malkah, 43, found herself on the receiving end of criticism about her underwear-free ways on Tuesday's edition of I'm A Celebrity...Get Me Out Of Here! following an argument with Ash Pollard.
Tziporah also reminded Ash that she wasn't the only one on camp with cooking skills, leaving Ash reeling.
Storming off, Ash let of steam in front of the cameras, saying 'We're not in a bloody 6-star restaurant. She should put a bra on too.'
The opportunity for their tension to explode soon arose when both Ash and Tziporah were selected to compete in the next challenge.
Taking a swipe: Storming off, Ash let of steam in front of the cameras, saying 'We're not in a bloody 6-star restaurant. She should put a bra on too'
The challenge would see both celebrities become buried alive in a dark crypt filled with snakes.
Ash and Tziporah would also have to deal with rising water levels as they scramble to escape from their underground trappings.
Last week, representatives for Tziporah poked fun at her penchant for going bra-free in the jungle by Tweeting topless photos from Kate's modelling heyday.
'Never been a big fan of bras to be honest': Last week, representatives for Tziporah poked fun at her penchant for going bra-free in the jungle by Tweeting topless photos from Kate's modelling heyday
'Never been a big fan of bras to be honest,' read the Tweet.
She previously appeared naked in 1993 film Sirens, a biopic of painter Norman Lindsay, playing a nude model alongside Elle Macpherson and Portia de Rossi.
She was also a fixture on the red carpet in the nineties, often going braless for the occasion.
Not shy! She previously appeared naked in 1993 film Sirens, a biopic of painter Norman Lindsay, playing a nude model alongside Elle Macpherson and Portia de Rossi
Her breast assets! She was also a fixture on the red carpet in the nineties, often going braless for the occasion (pictured in 1994)
